about_the_game:
Discover the world of Phalania!

A cute narrative game where friendships are built through your adventures! By the end of its development, RPG mechanics will be introduced. The game is still in the early stages of development.

Dive into the charming world of Fisherman's Island, an adventure game where you will meet lovable characters and create unforgettable moments with them. As you explore the island, you'll develop deep relationships with your friends, while a great danger threatens your world.

The first mission is now available, allowing you to begin your journey and uncover the story behind the island's mysteries.

Get ready for an adventure full of emotions, discoveries, and choices that will shape your future!

Features (Not yet fully introduced):

  • Cute and immersive adventure: Explore the island of Luga and build bonds with your adventure companions.

  • Relationship development: Your choices and interactions will shape your relationships with other characters, creating unique connections. (Coming soon)

  • Captivating story: A growing threat looms over the world, and you will need to discover how to protect your friends and the island before it's too late.

First mission available: Take your first steps in the adventure and start solving the island's mysteries.

Join us for an adventure where friends and choices matter, and where an imminent danger pushes you to protect what you hold dear!

Character Introduction of Fisherman's Island

Fisherman's Island offers a gallery of endearing and well-defined characters, whose relationships will evolve as you progress through your adventures. Here is an overview of the characters already introduced and those that will soon be available.

Introduced Characters

  • Eric

    Eric is the adoptive father of the main character. A seasoned fisherman and former adventurer, he plays a key role in teaching the basics of the game. Kind-hearted and protective, Eric introduces the player to the fundamentals of fishing while hiding secrets about his past and inner struggles.

  • Océane

    Océane is the main character’s best friend. Very close, she supports them throughout the adventure. With her warm personality and curious mind, she quickly becomes a valuable ally. She is also the one who introduces the mysteries related to the teleportation stones. Her friendship with the player will grow over time, and she will become a central pillar in the story.

  • Denise

    Denise is the fishmonger of the Luga village. With her sharp mind and down-to-earth nature, she knows all the ocean's secrets and is a valuable asset to the player. She manages the village's fish supply and may hold crucial information to solve the mystery of the missing fish.

Upcoming Characters

  • Poisséidon

    Poisséidon is the god of the sea, a powerful and ancient entity. He plays a central role in the story of the world of Phalania, and his anger could devastate the island and beyond. His awakening will mark a turning point in the adventure, and the player will need to figure out how to appease his wrath before it’s too late.

  • Aurélie

    Aurélie is Sophie’s daughter, a lively and curious young girl. She lives with her mother near the beach of Luga village. Although still young, she might have key information for the player as the adventure unfolds.

  • Francois

    Francois is a well-known food merchant in the village. His stall is full of local and exotic products. He is an important contact for the player, as he can provide rare resources and information about the strange events taking place on the island.

  • MAJ (The God of Order)

    MAJ is a mysterious and powerful god who organizes change in the world of Phalania. According to mythology, every building constructed, every city, every change in the structure of the world is done under his influence. He could be the key to understanding what’s really happening with the missing fish and the looming threat over Phalania.

  • Bill

    Bill is a rather peculiar character: a man who is often drunk, living in a tent away from the village. Although he may seem like an odd figure, he has lived many adventures and could hold surprising information. His offbeat presence should not be underestimated.

Many more characters to come!

The world of Fisherman's Island is vast, and many fascinating characters are yet to be discovered. Their stories and connections to the player will further enrich your adventure.
detailed_description:
devenez une légende du jeu !

Pre-order now and become a part of the game forever!

Everyone who purchases the game during Early Access will have their name etched into the game itself, immortalized in the "Abyss of Souls." (Coming soon)

Don't miss the chance to leave your mark on the world of Fisherman's Island : your name will be part of the adventure for all eternity!

legal_notice: The Oricia Games logo and the Fisherman's Island logo are the property of Oricia Games. Unreal Engine and the Unreal Engine logo are the property of Epic Games.
name: Fisherman's Island Alpha Test

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Welcome to the world of Phalania. Explore the world in search of ancient secrets and save the world from an impending disaster! For now, you can explore the different zones. WARNING, THE GAME IS NOT FINISHED, NOT ALL MECHANICS ARE PRESENT!
supported_languages:
French*, English
*languages with full audio support
